text.text_translated:
In the city of Moscow, there are many wild dogs.
They live on the streets.
There are about 35,000 dogs.
Some dogs were born on the streets.
Other dogs were pets, but their owners left them.
Some dogs live alone and other dogs live in groups.
In 2010, scientists studied the dogs.
They learned that the dogs live very well in the city.
The dogs learned it is safer to cross the street with people.
Some dogs also seem to understand traffic lights.
